credit_line: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
title: Knife
description: Blade with straight sides and leaf-shaped point. Hollow bolster, ferrules silver gilt with floral pattern. Tapered handles are ivory and bone in triangular pattern. In the middle of the handle black inlaid dots and two horizontal bands. Silver-gilt caps with floral pattern on the end of the handle.
name: Knife
